title: What K-pop groups are going to make a comeback in 2019? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let's start this list with the already announced groups: A-pink (According to Wikipedia) Ateez Favorite Blackpink(Teased By Jennie in A billboard interview) A.O.A.(Announced by FNC) WJSN/Cosmic Girls(Announced by Starship) Boyfriend (Announced by Starship) IZ*one(Though reportedly is a Japanese Debut) ONEUS VERIVERY DIA GFriend ASTRO (Full album) IKON KNK G.O.D. Red Velvet( As reported on SM channel) APRIL(Japanese Comeback) Dreamcatcher G-Reyish Oh my girl (Japanese) Honey Popcorn GOT7(Japanese) SNuper WayV(a.k.a. NCT china) Seventeen *I will update the list Now the BiG 3: SM: SMtown (Maybe) Super Junior D&ETVXQ Girls' Generation(Teased by Soyoung and Tiffany) Oh!GG may get a comebackShinee EXO EXO CBXNCT NCT Dream/127/UJYP: Twice DAY6 Stray Kids ITZY YG: Winner BIGBANG? Now all the peasants : AMUSE: Cross Gene A100: Neon punch Banana Culture: EXID Beat interactive: A.C.E. Big Hit: BTS BlockBerry: Loona(Teased as XX) C9: Good day Coridel: Playback Cube: BTOB CLC (G)idle Pentagon Cre.ker: The Boyz DSP: Kard DR Music: Rania/BP Rania FANTAGIO: Hellovenus Weki Meki FNC: SF9 Happy feet: Dal shabet Hunus: Elris Jellyfish: Vixx Gugudan Verivery Kiwi pop: GWSN Monstergram/JTG: Busters MLD: Momoland Mmo: In2it MYSTIC: Brown Eyed Girl's NH: Laboum N.CH: Nature Off the record: Fromis_9 PLEDIS: Pristin Pristin VNues't Nues't WPolaris: Ladies code RBW: MAMAMOO Shinhwa Company: Shinhwa Starship: Monsta X Star Empire: Star crew: Hotshot TS: Hotshot TOP ent: Up10tion Sonamoo VK: Lime Woolim: Infinite Lovelyz Golden Child No company: T-ara THAT TOOK ME A LOT, SO THANKS FOR READING MY LIST

This is just my prediction. iKON (Could be around middle of 2020) Gfriend (Early and middle-end of 2020 also could be release of JP mini album considering Fever could be made into JP ver just like TFTMN and SUNRISE and past releases) Twice ( Might have 2 comebacks still could be delayed if Mina had the same case as this year) Red velvet BTS Dreamcatcher ( Possibly 2 comebacks since PIRI, Deja Vu was a hit also a JP release) Blackpink (Could be not but still will be a comeback) ITZY (Seeing Twice had 2 comebacks, might also have 2 comebacks and just possibly a JP or CH ver) IZ*ONE (Latest was Japanese, Could be 2 comebacks and JP comeback) Shinee Momoland (Possibly no or might have a comeback)
